title: Celestial Automaton Gardener
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), ultra-detailed, 9:16 aspect ratio, full body shot of a majestic celestial automaton (or highly advanced robot) in ornate bronze and jade armor, standing in a grand Xianxia-style conservatory. The automaton has glowing teal accents and a stylized helmet, with an ethereal cyan energy halo encircling its head. It holds a glowing jade watering can, gently pouring luminous blue water onto a delicate, blooming white bonsai tree. The studio is filled with exotic houseplants, glowing lotus flowers, dark wooden stands, and intricate terrariums. Large arched windows show a misty, traditional Chinese mountain landscape. Volumetric lighting, spiritual energy flow, rich textures, Wuxia aesthetic.
